lang.ENTER_HELP_TEXT: Describe what you are having problem with...
lang.ALERT_STEP_SUCCESS: The step is done perfectly! Go to the next one.
lang.ALERT_STEP_FAIL: Unfortunately the step is failed. Go to the next one.
lang.END_ARE_YOU_SURE: Are you sure you want to end trainer execution?
lang.INSTRUCTION1: 1. In the simulator, you must click the appropriate command icons (interface buttons, highlighted in blue) to create primitives in the order used to create them, unless otherwise specified in the instructions for a particular step.
lang.INSTRUCTION2: 2. If the icon is pressed correctly - it is highlighted in green, if incorrect - red.
lang.INSTRUCTION3: 3. At some stages of the step you need to enter certain data in the text fields (fields that are intended for input are empty).
lang.INSTRUCTION4: 4. At each step you have two attempts - if the wrong icon is pressed twice, the step is not counted and you should go to the next step of the simulator.
lang.STEP1_TASK: Task: In the command bar of the interface, click the command icons in the correct order to create the Box item. First specify the color, then the shape size in the appropriate fields.
lang.STEP2_TASK: Task: In the command bar of the interface, click the command icons in the correct order to create a primitive. In the appropriate fields, specify the size of the primitive.
lang.STEP3_TASK: Task: In the command panel of the interface, click in the correct order on the command icons to create a Hedra primitive with the parameters from the table.
lang.STEP4_TASK: Task: In the command panel of the interface, click the command icons in the correct order to create an object with options according to your variant.
